topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f121816368724bb4c00000#post_53f121816368724bb4c00000
[bq="trashboat"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f120826368723d533c0000#post_53f120826368723d533c0000
That is one of the main problems with the internet, If you give someone an anonymous voice, They will say stupid shit. (The Stuff at cons was inexcusable though.)

It's a good thing my perceptions were never tainted like yours were. Because I don't know how I would go about my day without some Pokemon fetish porn. (And FA is the only site that mostly doesn't care for humans that I can think of)[/bq]
I'm going to say something massively unpopular, *BUT* the stereotypes against furries is 100% justified.  I know that most furries are okay and that nowadays their sites and cons are nothing like what they used to be *BUT* as someone that was around back when FA had just popped on the scene you know how there's all those stereotypes?  People used to actually do that shit and would threaten to stab anyone that said anything against them under the "Judge not your fellow furs".  Like one year at anthrocon a woman was raped and went to the police; you know what happened?  Because the person that raped her was popular furries threatened to bomb her house/kill her/rape her again saying that it would be "funny" to rape her again.

There used to be some serious motherfucking shit that used to go on.


Obviously no one puts up with this shit anymore, but it massively left a metaphorical sour taste in my mouth.

If I had to summarize the difference between 2014 furries and say 2001 furries is that 2014 people don't put up with this shit anymore.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f124156368723d39b90000#post_53f124156368723d39b90000
I just like how Bronies were cool enough to not make any "counter-hate" art towards Furries.

The amount of anti-Pony art made by people outside our circle heavily outweighs any "hate art" our fandom has ever produced against them.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f124156368723d39b90000#post_53f124156368723d39b90000
[bq="trashboat"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f120826368723d533c0000#post_53f120826368723d533c0000
And besides, Those nuts were probably a Vocal minority.[/bq]
I don't subscribe to the "Most of them were huge nuts back then" Theory, The Loud ones are always more noticeable than everyone else.

They definitely were. Even then I feel like they still had a better reputation than bronies do.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f124656368722810970100#post_53f124656368722810970100
Nah, I've seen some cool Furries on FA, Brony or not. In fact, some of my buddies here are Furries too.

The thing I hate about Furaffinity is that how too many artists appear to be too overprotective and stingy over their contents to a point they wouldn't even let any unregistered users view them. I don't get the point of that. Why post your art publicly where pseudo-anonymous _registered_ usercan just steal them as long as they are able to view them? DeviantArt doesn't usually pull this shit off, even though they could.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f126436368727020380000#post_53f126436368727020380000
Okay, That is bad.

I still feel that FA is one of the best sites for viewing porn though.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f126436368727020380000#post_53f126436368727020380000
I agree that it sucks but I can understand the idea behind it. 
Firstly, if someone draws mostly porn, an unregistered user won't see most of their art anyways. Second, I'm certain that a registration screen deflects a whole lot of trolls.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f127126368723d536d0100#post_53f127126368723d536d0100
The technical problem with FA is how badly it's programmed.

To make it short: the site staff lists Carenth, Yak and Net-cat as the programmers but in reality they're like Carmen Sandiego to the point people thought they died or something.

The only person that actually does any of the programming is Dragoneer.

I'm not one who would know about stuff like that.

The only thing that really bugs me about that site is that you can only view 2000 images in a search, I still don't know why it does that.

It's weird, Sometimes I hate you with all of my hate, Sometimes you're a really cool guy, And I find that really weird.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f120826368723d533c0000#post_53f120826368723d533c0000
[bq="uc9"]

What I mean by this is that when the site first came out there was a fuck ton of death threats constantly being flung on the site for stupid shit.  "Oh my fucking god!  You don't have a danmaku of renamon and think that she's over rated?!  I'll stab you in the fucking throat while you're asleep and rape your corpse".  I'm just going to straight up admit it I don't want nothing to do with the furry fandom cause there used to be a lot of racism, heterophobic and sexist hate on the sites early 2000's.  What I mean by this is back in the day your average furry site/con or shit was pretty much, "You 'breeders'(derogatory term for straight people)/women/minorities are ruining the fandom!  I'll stab you in the fucking throat!  FURRY PRIDE!"

I know cons and sites are no longer like this anymore and that con staff and site owners have massively cracked down on this sort of behavior but there is no way in the everliving hell I'm ever going to a con or interacting with furries to any level because of the shit I've seen.  Why?  Cause simply put while I'm talking about the furry fandom here right now I'm talking about the internet and all fandoms actually threatening to kill someone because of their race/sex/sexuality or threatening to kill someone over cartoon characters is massively unacceptable behavior and some times you have to put on your big boy pants, act like a adult and *NOT* threaten to kill someone in their sleep like a psychopath.[/bq]
These behaviors are mostly driven by overinflated ego, and the lack of sense of consequences along with a perceived sense of safety behind a computer screen. Which is also the main reason why rowdy 4Chan and Tumblr user do the shit they do.

As for Furries. Just stay away from those who try to live like their Fursona animals.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc
